title: Linux lilo Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the lilo command, a powerful Linux boot loader, through practical examples. Learn how to configure lilo, troubleshoot issues, and enhance your system's boot process.

verify.name: Verify lilo version
verify.hint: The lilo version installed on the system should be 22.8.1. Please check the output of the `sudo lilo -V` command.

verify.name: Verify lilo configuration file
verify.hint: The lilo configuration file should contain the "label=Ubuntu 22.04" entry. Please check the contents of the /etc/lilo.conf file.

verify.name: Verify lilo log file
verify.hint: The lilo log file located at /var/log/lilo.log should not contain any error messages. Please check the contents of the log file.
